scripts.dist: npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ../../webpack.config.js --output-library CommercetoolsHttpUserAgent --output-library-target umd src/index.js dist/commercetools-http-user-agent.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ../../webpack.config.js --output-library CommercetoolsHttpUserAgent --output-library-target umd src/index.js dist/commercetools-http-user-agent.min.js
